title: Air pollution
creator_credit: Gilbert Altschul Productions and Journal Films
brief_description: Defines air pollution and views the many man-made and natural causes. Uses plant life to show how pollution affects health and the economy. Discusses elimination of the sources of pollution and possible methods of control. Covers facts and broad social trends relating to the problem.
